timeline.message: Add all prayer activation sound effect IDs

timeline.bodyText: Instead of naming each of these after the ID, name them after the prayer, eg. PRAYER_ACTIVATE_THICK_SKIN
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: This value is used only once, and is clear without a variable name attached to it, so this should be passed directly to the contains() check instead.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.message: Name prayer activation sound constants appropriately
